translation.en: You're in?
It's a doorway to another realm, my friends, and providence has brought you to me.
translation.de: Es ist eine Tür in ein anderes Reich. Die Vorsehung führte euch zu mir.

translation.en: We go through it together.
-By the way, what's your name? -Scott Ward.
-[safecracker] Sorry? -Scott Ward.
Are you ready to play?
♪ Don't go around tonight ♪
Yeah.
Scott, this is Damon. That's Chambers.
translation.de: Scott, das ist Damon. Das ist Chambers.

translation.en: -They're with me. They'll be on my dime. -Okay.
translation.de: -Sie gehören zu mir. Ich bezahle sie. -Ok.

translation.en: -[Damon] How's it going? -Welcome to the team.
[Vanderohe] Scott, you want to tell me what's up with the kid?
translation.de: Scott, was will der Kleine hier?

translation.en: Look at him. No offense, but he doesn't look like zombie killer material.
translation.de: Nichts für ungut, der sieht nicht nach Zombie-Killer aus.

translation.en: Hi, my name is Dieter, and I'm going to open what cannot be opened.
translation.de: Hi. Ich bin Dieter, und ich werde öffnen, was nicht geöffnet werden kann.

translation.en: [laughs] Are you kidding me?
[Scott] No, we need the kid to open the safe.
translation.de: Nein. Der Junge muss den Safe öffnen.

translation.en: We lose him, we got nothing.
Let's go, guys. Bring it in.
Mr. Tanaka, team's all here.
translation.de: Mr. Tanaka, das Team ist hier.

translation.en: [Tanaka] Lovely to have you all gathered here today.
translation.de: Schön, dass ihr alle hier versammelt seid.

translation.en: Meet your target.
The Vegas Bly.
You can't fly into Vegas.
translation.de: Nach Vegas kann man nicht fliegen.

translation.en: It's restricted airspace.
But you can fly out.
There is an abandoned rescue helicopter on top of the north tower, Sodom.
translation.de: Auf dem Nordturm Sodom steht ein Rettungshubschrauber.

translation.en: If you coordinate and communicate, this should be a simple in-and-out.
translation.de: Mit guter Absprache und Kommunikation seid ihr schnell drin und wieder draußen.

translation.en: [Tanaka] You will enter the city with a 32-hour window.
translation.de: Wenn ihr die Stadt betretet, habt ihr 32 Stunden Zeit.

translation.en: Whatever zombies are still walking
should be no problem for a gang of tough hombres such as yourselves.
translation.de: sollten kein Problem für eine Gang aus harten hombres wie euch sein.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
My apologies.
How precisely do we do the zombie killing?
translation.de: Wie genau killen wir diese Zombies?

translation.en: Oh, Jesus.
[Scott] Is there anybody else here who hasn't killed a zombie?
translation.de: Noch wer, der noch keinen Zombie getötet hat?

translation.en: Well, we all know the basics.
Zombies, shamblers, the undead, whatever you wanna call them,
translation.de: Zombies, Schlurfer, Untote, wie immer sie heißen.

translation.en: when it comes to killing them, it's all about the brain.
translation.de: Beim Töten dreht sich alles ums Gehirn.

translation.en: Brain.
One comes at you, shoot it in the brain. It's that simple. Any questions?
translation.de: Einer kommt auf dich zu, schieß ins Gehirn. Ganz einfach. Fragen?

translation.en: Yes. What if I took a big rock and smashed it into the head?
translation.de: Ja. Könnte ich ihm mit einem großen Stein den Kopf zertrümmern?

translation.en: Would… would that work?
Yeah. Yeah, that, uh… that also would still be targeting the brain, so that would work.
translation.de: Ja, das zielt auch aufs Gehirn, also würde es auch gehen.

translation.en: Copy that.
Sorry, Mr. Tanaka, please continue.
[Tanaka] From there, you move down the Strip.
translation.de: Jetzt lauft ihr den Strip entlang.

translation.en: You'll reach the casino in less than two hours.
translation.de: In weniger als zwei Stunden seid ihr beim Casino.

translation.en: You go in and find the generator.
The safe, beneath the south tower, Gomorrah…
translation.de: Der Safe unter dem Südturm Gomorrah…

translation.en: is at the end of a hallway.
There, you'll find several nonlethal deterrents.
translation.de: Da gibt es mehrere nicht tödliche Abwehrmechanismen.

translation.en: You'll have to find a way to trigger them.
Meanwhile, our fearless pilot-slash-mechanic fuels the helicopter.
translation.de: Derweil tankt unsere furchtlose Pilotin/Mechanikerin den Heli auf.

translation.en: Back at the main door, our safecracker gets to work.
translation.de: Wieder am Hauptzugang geht unser Safeknacker an die Arbeit.

translation.en: Like a surgeon or a painter,
translation.de: Wie ein Chirurg oder ein Maler.

translation.en: his masterpiece rendered in barely audible clicks.
translation.de: Sein Meisterwerk wird sich in kaum hörbaren Knacklauten äußern.

translation.en: Finally, she succumbs to the sheer dominance of his gentle touch.
translation.de: Schließlich ergibt sie sich der Dominanz seiner sanften Berührung.

translation.en: Then, all you have to do is load the money on the helicopter
translation.de: Dann müsst ihr nur noch das Geld in den Helikopter laden

translation.en: and fly off into the sunset.
-All this… -[snaps fingers]
…a full day before the nuke ever leaves the launchpad.
translation.de: einen Tag, bevor die Atombombe gezündet wird.

translation.en: Easy peasy Japanese-y.
[clears throat] Sorry, sir.
We're not allowed to say that anymore. It's "lemon squeezy" now.
translation.de: Das dürfen wir nicht mehr sagen. Es heißt jetzt "Polonaise".

translation.en: Yeah, but I'm--
I think it's fine if he's Japanese-y.
translation.de: Es ist ok, wenn er Japanese ist.

translation.en: [Tanaka] As you wish.
Easy peasy lemon squeezy.
Take a look.
Oh. Okay. Good job. Good job.
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Hold on. This is the real plan? It's zombies?
translation.de: Moment mal. Das ist der echte Plan? Mit Zombies?

translation.en: Yeah, bro, what's going on? I thought you were cool with it.
translation.de: Ja, Bro, was ist los? Ich dachte, das ist ok für dich.

translation.en: You were always talking about how, if you saw a zombie, you'd fuck his shit up.
translation.de: Du sagst immer, Zombies würdest du am Arsch packen.

translation.en: That was bullshit, man.
What?
[Damon] Fuck this. I'm out. This is crazy. You all are gonna die.
translation.de: Scheiß drauf. Ich bin raus. Das ist verrückt. Ihr geht alle drauf.

translation.en: -Jesus Christ. -[Damon] Sorry, brother.
[Scott] Amateurs.
Hey, Damon. Wait, man.
[Scott] All right, team, grab your load-out bags. See you at 6:00 a.m. sharp.
translation.de: Ok, greift euch eure Ausrüstung. Bis morgen um Punkt 6 Uhr.

translation.en: [Vanderohe] Roger that, Cap.
Now, hold up, hold up.
My name's Martin. I'm Mr. Tanaka's head of security.
translation.de: Ich bin Martin, Mr. Tanakas Sicherheitschef.

translation.en: Anything you need, you talk to me.
translation.de: Wenn ihr was braucht, fragt mich.

translation.en: I can access any hardware you might want.
I'll also be accompanying you on this job
because of my extensive knowledge of the casino.
translation.de: weil ich das Casino sehr gut kenne.

translation.en: Any questions?
Good. See you at 0600.
[Dieter] 0600?
[Tanaka] How're you feeling?
[Scott] You're insane. You know that, right?
translation.de: Es ist irre, das wissen Sie?

translation.en: But if it's a choice between dying on the Strip and spending another day flipping patties at the Lucky Boy,
translation.de: Entweder auf dem Strip sterben oder weiter Hamburger im Lucky Boy braten.

translation.en: I'll gamble on a few million.
Have you given any thought to how you'll get in?
translation.de: Haben Sie schon überlegt, wie Sie reinkommen?

translation.en: Yeah.
[woman over PA] Recent arrivals require a full health inspection.
Barstow Quarantine Center is a zero-tolerance facility.
Without a green health clearance sticker on your key card,
translation.de: Ohne grünen Gesundheitsaufkleber auf der Schlüsselkarte

translation.en: you will not be permitted in common areas.
[Scott] Hey. Kate.
-What are you doing here? -I need to talk to you.
-No. No! -Wait. Whoa!
Just hear me out. Hear me out.
I have an opportunity,
and I need your help.
Look. I know this is gonna sound crazy.
translation.de: Ich weiß, das klingt jetzt verrückt.

translation.en: But do one thing for me.
translation.de: Aber tu eine Sache für mich.

translation.en: For you?
Do this one thing, and I can give you $15 million.
translation.de: Nur eine Sache, und ich kann dir 15 Millionen geben.

translation.en: -Fifteen million? -Fifteen…
You don't have $15 million.
If you do this one thing for me, I will.
translation.de: Wenn du diese eine Sache für mich tust, dann habe ich sie.

translation.en: I know this is not gonna make up for what I did… -[scoffs] -…or what type of father I was.
translation.de: Es macht nicht wieder gut, was ich tat oder was für ein Vater ich war.

translation.en: Yeah.
With $15 million, you can help these people.
translation.de: Mit 15 Millionen kannst du diesen Leuten helfen.

translation.en: You can go back to school, do whatever you want.
translation.de: Wieder zur Uni gehen, was immer.

translation.en: Whatever you do with this money, I know will be the right thing.
translation.de: Was du mit dem Geld auch tust, ich weiß, es ist das Richtige.

translation.en: What one thing?
[Geeta] Hey. Please! Hey. Hey.
You're the coyote, right?
Take us in. Please.
Please.
Not bad for your first time.
-[chuckles] -Okay, I get it. I understand.
I understand what beautiful little machine. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich verstehe. So eine schöne kleine Maschine.

translation.en: Hey, don't point a gun at me.
Sorry. Sorry.
[Scott] Here comes our ride.
-Oh, good. You want some water? -Yeah.
You're kidding. What is this?
translation.de: Ist das ein Witz? Was soll das?

translation.en: What?
I swear to God, if this whole mission
is some insane way for you to reconnect with your daughter--
translation.de: eine verrückte Versöhnung mit deiner Tochter ist, dann…

translation.en: It's not, all right? Trust me.
translation.de: So ist es nicht. Vertrau mir.

translation.en: She's a volunteer at the camp. She's got connections.
translation.de: Sie ist Freiwillige im Lager, hat Kontakte.

translation.en: She's just giving us a ride into the quarantine zone. You really think I'd take her inside the city?
translation.de: Sie fährt uns nur in die Quarantänezone. Denkst du, ich bringe sie in die Stadt?

translation.en: ♪ This is the end ♪
translation.de: WARNUNG - AB HIER QUARANTÄNEZONE US-RECHT AUSSER KRAFT

translation.en: Hey, how you doing? I don't think we've officially met. My name's Martin.
translation.de: Wie geht's? Wir kennen uns noch nicht. Ich bin Martin.

translation.en: Don't talk to me. I don't trust these people, especially you.
translation.de: Klappe. Ich traue denen nicht, vor allem dir nicht.

translation.en: -Oh. -You stay the hell away from me.
Yes, ma'am.
[man over PA] Detainees at the Las Vegas McCarran Quarantine Center,
this facility will be closed by the end of the day. No personnel…
translation.de: Die Anlage wird heute Abend geschlossen. Kein Personal…

translation.en: Criminals, meet your coyote.
Does coyote girl have a name?
Lilly, but "coyote" sounds cool.
You can just call me that if you want.
translation.de: Nenn mich so, wenn du willst.

translation.en: All right, I'll leave you guys to it.
I'll meet you outside Barstow in 24 hours.
-Okay? -Okay.
Try not to get nuked or murdered by the undead.
translation.de: Lasst euch nicht wegbomben oder von Untoten ermorden.

translation.en: [Kate] Hey. Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. What's wrong?
Mom's gone.
-[Vanderohe] Here. -Um…
Question.
Yes, Dieter.
You don't think I need something bigger?
If I give you something bigger than that, you're already dead.
translation.de: Mit etwas Größerem wärst du schon tot.

translation.en: Dead?
Auf Wiedersehen, dead.
Um, this belongs to where?
Give me a fucking break. Really?
Dieter, try not to piss Van off.
Thank you, sir.
-What did you do? -What do you mean?
[Kate] Stop!
Get off me!
-Stop! -What the hell's going on?
The hell are you doing?
[Kate] You took her in. You took in Geeta.
translation.de: Du hast sie reingebracht. Du hast Geeta reingebracht.

translation.en: -Yeah. I took her in. Her and two others. -[gasps]
translation.de: Ja. Ich habe sie reingebracht. Mit zwei anderen.

translation.en: I take a lot of people in. They need that money to get out of here.
translation.de: Ich bringe viele rein. Mit dem Geld kommen sie hier weg.

translation.en: -You know that. -She didn't come back.
Well, not everyone does.
-They know the risks. -[Kate] She has two kids!
-[Lilly] She didn't tell me that. -[scoffs]
Listen, if I knew she had kids, I wouldn't have taken her.
translation.de: Hätte ich es gewusst, hätte ich es nicht getan.

translation.en: Did you see her die?
No.
They went ahead. I… I hung back.
translation.de: Sie gingen los. Ich blieb zurück.

translation.en: They never came out. I'm sorry.
translation.de: Sie kamen nicht mehr raus. Es tut mir leid.

translation.en: I waited, Kate, as long as I could, but at the end of the day--
translation.de: Ich habe lange gewartet, aber irgendwann…

translation.en: I'm coming with you.
-No, you're not. -Yes, I am.
We're not having this conversation. You're not coming.
There are two kids whose mother is lost in there.
translation.de: Die Mutter von zwei Kindern ist da drin.

translation.en: Two kids that I help look out for. I have to find her.
translation.de: Zwei Kinder, auf die ich aufpasse. Ich muss sie finden.

translation.en: Well, tell us what she looks like. We'll look out for her.
translation.de: Beschreib sie uns. Wir suchen sie.

translation.en: -You think I trust you to do that? -Kate!
-You're not coming! -I'm not asking you!
I'm telling you what's gonna happen.
translation.de: Ich sage dir, wie es läuft.

translation.en: Come here.
Listen to me. As someone who's seen what this looks like,
translation.de: Hör mir zu. Ich habe gesehen, wie das aussieht.

translation.en: this is not a path you wanna go down. I'm not gonna let you try.
translation.de: Den Weg willst du nicht gehen. Ich lasse es nicht zu.

translation.en: You're gonna stay put.
We'll look for your friend. I'll see you when we get out.
translation.de: Wir suchen deine Freundin und sehen uns dann.

translation.en: -Okay? -No. No, not okay.
You listen.
I'm going in either way.
I can go in with you, and you can keep me safe.
translation.de: Entweder mit euch, und ihr beschützt mich.

translation.en: -Kate. -Or-- Or… I'll just sneak in after you,
and I'll probably die.
The choice is yours.
What's it gonna be, Dad?
If we see your friend, great.
translation.de: Wenn wir deine Freundin sehen, toll.

translation.en: But you are not to run off looking for her. This is life or death.
translation.de: Aber du suchst sie nicht allein. Es geht um Leben und Tod.

translation.en: And if you screw around, some of these people are gonna die.
translation.de: Wenn du Mist baust, sterben ein paar dieser Leute.

translation.en: You understand that?
And they've got families too.
So you are never, ever to leave my sight.
translation.de: Du gehst niemals aus meinem Blickfeld.

translation.en: Those are my terms. Are we clear?
Yeah. We're clear.
Guys, this is Kate,
newest member of the team.
-Hey. Hello. -How's it going?
Scott, what the fuck?
[officer] You having a good time? What's he talking about?
translation.de: Habt ihr Spaß? Worüber redet er?

translation.en: The bomb that's coming to kill you? Is that what you're talking about?
translation.de: Die Bombe, die euch töten wird? Redet ihr darüber?

translation.en: That's the last bus.
Go, Speedy Gonzales! Arriba.
[man over PA] This is a mandatory evacuation zone.
-We're going to need one more guy. -For what?
You don't know what it's like in there. Not anymore.
translation.de: Du weißt nicht, wie es da drin ist. Nicht mehr.

translation.en: -The team's big enough-- -Trust me. We need another person.
translation.de: -Wir sind genug… -Glaub mir. Wir brauchen jemanden.

translation.en: What the hell's going on here?
You want to make 20 grand?
Twenty thousand dollars?
Yeah, I'll make 20 fucking grand.
I don't fucking get it. Why the fuck would she bring him?
translation.de: Ich kapier's nicht. Scheiße, warum der?

translation.en: Honey, easy with the f-bombs, okay?
translation.de: Schatz, achte auf deine Wortwahl, ok?

translation.en: -[Kate] Are you kidding? -[officer] Chainsaw.
We're about to march into a sea of dead people and commit grand larceny.
translation.de: Wir betreten ein Meer von Untoten und begehen schweren Diebstahl.

translation.en: -But excuse me for swearing. -That's for you.
[officer] Me? [chuckles] Oh, yes.
I got this.
We're gonna have some fun, yeah?
I'm telling you, you got the right guy for this.
translation.de: Ich sage euch, ihr habt den Richtigen dafür.

translation.en: And also, if you happen to get scared in there or nervous,
translation.de: Und falls du da drin Angst kriegst oder nervös wirst,

translation.en: I want you to stay close to me.
-Mm-hmm. -I got you. -Thanks. -[gun cocking]
What's up, bro?
Gas tank. You carry that.
Don't ever touch my saw again, okay? Don't ever talk to her again…
translation.de: Fass meine Säge nie wieder an. Rede nie wieder mit ihr.

translation.en: bro.
-Okay. For sure. -[Vanderohe] Good answer.
[Lilly] All right, guys, let's go!
The fuck you looking at?
Behind me.
Put your gun up, idiot.
Hey. It's not too late to go back.
[Lilly] There they are, the shamblers,
what's left of them.
What happened to them exactly?
[Lilly] What's it look like?
Weren't smart enough to get out of the sun.
translation.de: Zu dumm, um aus der Sonne zu gehen.

translation.en: You should see what happens when it rains. For a few hours, they all come back to life.
translation.de: Ihr solltet sehen, was bei Regen passiert. Für ein paar Stunden leben sie wieder.

translation.en: Okay, let's go. Come on.
How… how much rain is… [Chambers] Let's get this.
Tourists.
Hey, you're Lilly, right?
You sure know your way around here.
translation.de: Du kennst dich hier gut aus.

translation.en: Well, what's it to you?
Well, maybe a lot.
How much you know about how these things operate?
translation.de: Wie viel weißt du über diese Dinger?

translation.en: Everything there is.
-Hmm. -[Lilly] Why?
[chuckles] Good to know.
[Chambers] Holy shit. What is all this?
translation.de: Meine Scheiße. Was ist das alles?

translation.en: [Kate] What happened here?
[Lilly] Where the police and military finally fell.
translation.de: Polizei und Militär wurden hier besiegt.

translation.en: -Vegas' last stand. -[growling deeply]
-[Guzman] Whoa, whoa. Everybody be quiet. -[growling]
Do you hear that?
-What the hell is that? -Get behind the car! Go!
What is this?
[Martin] It's a goddamn zombie tiger.
That's crossing the line.
-[Chambers] Hell, yeah. -[Guzman] Awesome.
Clear.
-Los geht's. -[Dieter] Okay.
[officer] The hell was that?
She was one of Siegfried and Roy's.
She guards the beginning of their territory.
-Is there another way around? -Not really.
translation.de: -Gibt es einen Weg außen rum? -Nicht wirklich.

translation.en: Hey, Cummings. Let me see your gun for a second.
translation.de: Hey, Cummings, zeig mir deine Waffe.

translation.en: What? No shot.
[Lilly] Just for a second.
I like it. It's beautiful.
It's reliable too.
-Oh, yeah? -Yeah.
Can I touch it?
-You wanna touch it? -Yeah.
Just for a second.
Just for a second.
-[Cummings] Oh, my… -[Peters] Hey!
I would say I was hoping I wouldn't have to do that, but I'd be lying.
translation.de: Es wäre gelogen, zu sagen, ich wollte das nicht.

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -What is she doing?
She just shot me. Shoot her!
They'll know we're here. They won't care so long as we play by their rules.
translation.de: Wir sind ihnen egal, wenn wir ihre Regeln befolgen.

translation.en: -Rules? De qué habla esta pendeja? -[Guzman] O sea, está loca.
translation.de: -Regeln? De qué habla esta pendeja? -O sea, está loca.

translation.en: If we wanna go further, we have to make a trade.
-Trade? Really? -[Cummings] No trade!
Yes. An offering to show our subservience.
translation.de: Ja. Eine Gabe als Zeichen unserer Unterwerfung.

translation.en: -They don't think. -[Cummings] Shoot this bitch!
-If they come, we kill them. -[Lilly] You don't understand.
-They're not what you think they are. -[Cummings] Shoot her in the face!
-[screaming] -We're not talking about shamblers here.
translation.de: Verdammt! Es geht hier nicht um Schlurfer.

translation.en: You're right. They don't think.
They just move and eat. But we're talking about the other ones.
translation.de: Sie laufen und fressen. Aber es geht um die anderen.

translation.en: -The alphas. -Yes. They're smarter. They're faster.
They're organized. Straight out of your fucking nightmares.
translation.de: Sie sind organisiert. Ein einziger Albtraum.

translation.en: [Cummings] Please.
You all keep talking about the city like it's their prison.
translation.de: Ihr seht die Stadt als euer Gefängnis an.

translation.en: It's not. It's their kingdom.
They won't mind us poking around the outside so long as we play by their rules.
translation.de: Sie lassen uns draußen rumlaufen, wenn wir ihre Regeln befolgen.

translation.en: -[Cummings] Oh my God! -We're moving into the heart of it now.
I have a mother. I love her.
Well, everyone has a mom, you cunt,
translation.de: Alle haben eine Mom, du Fotze,

translation.en: but not everyone is an abuser lording power over quarantined women.
translation.de: aber nicht alle nutzen Frauen in Quarantäne aus.

translation.en: [Cummings sobbing] She's lying! That's not true.
[Lilly] Shut your mouth. I've seen what you've done to those women.
translation.de: Klappe. Ich habe gesehen, was du den Frauen antatst.

translation.en: -[kick thuds] -You fucking rapist.
[Cummings] Oh my God! That's not true at all.
translation.de: Mein Gott! Das stimmt doch nicht.

translation.en: -Oh, fuck, no! No! -She's coming.
[Cummings] Who's coming? What's coming?
-She? What's she? -[Cummings] No, please. We bonded. Please.
translation.de: -Was ist sie? -Nein, bitte. Bindet mich los. Bitte.

translation.en: No. No, no, no. Don't trust her.
-[Dieter] Sorry. -[Cummings] No, please.
Help me. Don't go. No, we're a team.
translation.de: Helft mir. Geht nicht. Nein, wir sind ein Team.

translation.en: What the…
What… what the fuck?
Help. Shoot this! What the fuck is this thing?
translation.de: Hilfe. Erschießt das Ding! Was ist das?

translation.en: Listen, no. No. Hi.
-I'm not here to hurt you. -[screeching]
Come on. Help me, help me, help me, help me.
No! No, no, no, no, no.
[Cummings] Help me!
Don't do it. Just stay away.
What are you doing?
[sobbing] No. Oh my God!
Go away. Go over there. Go over there.
[screaming] No!
Help! No!
-[Scott] You ever seen her kill anyone? -[Lilly] Couple times.
translation.de: -Hast du sie je töten sehen? -Ein paarmal.

translation.en: -[Cummings] No! -[screeching]
[Scott] Did they come back?
[Lilly] Yep, as shamblers.
[Cummings] No!
[Lilly] My theory, this started with one of them, an original.
translation.de: Meine Theorie ist, dass es mit einem anfing, dem Original.

translation.en: [Cummings] Oh, my God! No!
[Lilly] Whoever that is, if he bites you--
-[Vanderohe] Then you become an alpha. -[Lilly] Exactly.
Looks like they're taking him to the Olympus.
Good. Now we know where not to go.
translation.de: Gut. Dahin gehen wir also nicht.

translation.en: [Lilly] I've never figured out exactly how it works.
translation.de: Mir war nie klar, wie es genau abläuft.

translation.en: All I know is they take you in there, and you come out like one of them,
translation.de: Sie holen dich rein, und du kommst als einer von ihnen raus,

translation.en: one of the fast ones.
-So, they're taking him there to turn him. -[Lilly] Yes.
Scott, that could be where Geeta is.
Kate, we've already talked about this.
-[Kate] We have time. -[Scott] It's not an option.
That's what I thought.
So, the shithead buys us passage, and we keep going?
translation.de: Der Arsch sichert uns freie Passage. Gehen wir weiter?

translation.en: Well, yeah. The shithead should buy us some goodwill,
